extension.dc:title: GGBN Material Sample Extension
extension.name: MaterialSample
extension.dc:description: Support for material sample properties (e.g. tissues, DNA, RNA) as an extension to a Material Sample core. Intended to be a one to one relation to the Material Sample core.

property.name: materialSampleType
property.dc:description: Classification of kind of physical sample in addition to BasisOfRecord/RecordBasis and Preparation Type. Please use preparationType for further specification such as "leg","blood","gDNA","axenic culture". Equal to KindOfUnit in ABCD!
property.examples: tissue, culture strain, specimen, DNA, RNA, Protein.

property.name: concentration
property.dc:description: Concentration of DNA (weight ng/volume µl)

property.name: concentrationUnit
property.dc:description: Unit used for concentration measurement

property.name: methodDeterminationConcentrationAndRatios
property.dc:description: Description of method used for concentration measurement

property.name: ratioOfAbsorbance260_230
property.dc:description: Ratio of absorbance at 260 nm and 230 nm assessing DNA purity (mostly secondary measure, indicates mainly EDTA, carbohydrates, phenol), (DNA samples only).

property.name: ratioOfAbsorbance260_280
property.dc:description: Ratio of absorbance at 280 nm and 230 nm assessing DNA purity (mostly secondary measure, indicates mainly EDTA, carbohydrates, phenol), (DNA samples only).

property.name: volume
property.dc:description: Volume of sample

property.name: volumeUnit
property.dc:description: Unit used for volume measurement

property.name: weight
property.dc:description: Weight of sample

property.name: weightUnit
property.dc:description: Unit used for weight measurement

property.name: methodDeterminationWeight
property.dc:description: Description of method used for weight measurement

property.name: purificationMethod
property.dc:description: DNA purification kit (company/product name) or protocol.

property.name: qualityCheckDate
property.dc:description: Date of quality check (e.g. Nanodrop measurement (DNA))

property.name: quality
property.dc:description: Sample quality estimation based on parameters described at QualityRemarks

property.name: qualityRemarks
property.dc:description: Description of methods and parameters defining low, medium or high quality of a sample

property.name: samp_size
property.dc:description: Amount or size of sample (volume, mass or area) that was collected

property.name: sieving
property.dc:description: collection design of pooled samples and/or sieve size and amount of sample sieved

property.name: DNADNAHybridization
property.dc:description: Result of DNA-DNA hybridization, e.g. strain: measurement value percentage

property.name: DNAMeltingPoint
property.dc:description: result of melting temperature (Tm) analysis, e.g. measurement value unit

property.name: estimated_size
property.dc:description: The estimated size of the genome prior to sequencing. Of particular importance in the sequencing of (eukaryotic) genome which could remain in draft form for a long or unspecified period

property.name: pool_dna_extracts
property.dc:description: Pooling of DNA extracts (if done). Were multiple DNA extractions mixed? How many?
